sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; const Sacraments: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); return (

{t('sacraments.title')}

{t('sacraments.baptism')}

Preparation classes required. Contact the parish office to schedule.

Requirements: Birth certificate, parents' marriage certificate (if applicable)

{t('sacraments.confirmation')}

Two-year preparation program for youth and adults.

Age: 14+ years

{t('sacraments.marriage')}

Six-month preparation program required. Contact priest at least 6 months in advance.

Documents: Baptismal certificates, ID copies

{t('sacraments.rcia')}

Rite of Christian Initiation for Adults - journey to join the Catholic Church.

Starts: September annually

); }; export default Sacraments;
